On April 9, at the annual Sea-Air-Space exposition, Secretary of the Navy Carlos Del Toro released the 2024 Naval S&T Strategy, which serves as "sailing directions" for strengthening collaborative relationships to accelerate delivery of innovative solutions to the US Navy and United States Marine Corps. The Strategy aligns with three primary principles established by SECNAV: Strengthening Maritime Dominance, Building a Culture of Warfighting Excellence and Enhancing Strategic Partnerships. Read the Naval S&T Strategy in greater detail: https://lnkd.in/eDvpAMn Office of the Secretary of the Navy | #SECNAV #STEM #innovation #SAS2024

Join us in celebrating the future of naval aviation with the latest graduates from the Naval STEM-sponsored US Navy and United States Marine Corps JROTC Flight Academy! ‚úà The Flight Academy offers high school students in Navy and USMC JROTC a unique opportunity to explore potential careers in naval aviation. Out of hundreds of applicants, 26 students completed ground school, and an impressive 20 obtained their Private Pilot's License! ‚ÄúChallenging and engaging STEM programs like the Flight Academy are valuable to nurturing the next generation of Sailor or Marine,‚Äù said Chief of Naval Research Rear Adm. Kurt Rothenhaus. ‚ÄúThey also pave the way for new innovations and perspectives that will strengthen the fleet and force.‚Äù ‚ú® For the latest news in #NavalSTEM projects, programs and events, follow the Naval STEM Coordination Office on LinkedIn.
